20110104020657.000|20110104020659.000|CC1|TRADITIONAL CEREMONIES.

20110104021737.000|20110104021740.000|CC1|SKYROCKETED OVER THE PAST THREE 
20110104021740.000|20110104021745.000|CC1|YEARS, REACHING $40 MILLION.    
20110104021745.000|20110104021747.000|CC1|THE COMPANY'S SUSHI CONVEYOR    
20110104021747.000|20110104021748.000|CC1|SYSTEM USED TO BE SQUARE SHAPED,
20110104021748.000|20110104021753.000|CC1|WITH CURVED CORNERS.            
20110104021753.000|20110104021755.000|CC1|PLATES PILE UP AND SPIN AROUND  
20110104021755.000|20110104021801.000|CC1|AT THE SHARP CURVES.            
20110104021801.000|20110104021803.000|CC1|SOME EVEN JAM UP SO MUCH THAT   
20110104021803.000|20110104021805.000|CC1|THEY ARE PUSHED OFF THE BELT AND
20110104021805.000|20110104021811.000|CC1|FALL TO THE FLOOR.              
20110104021811.000|20110104021812.000|CC1|THE FIRM OVERCAME THIS LONG-TERM
20110104021812.000|20110104021816.000|CC1|PROBLEM THREE YEARS AGO WITH A  
20110104021816.000|20110104021819.000|CC1|BELT THAT MAKES A 180 DEGREE    
20110104021819.000|20110104021825.000|CC1|U-TURN.                         
20110104021825.000|20110104021827.000|CC1|THE OPTIMAL HEIGHT DIFFERENCE   
20110104021827.000|20110104021828.000|CC1|BETWEEN THE CONVEYOR AND THE    
20110104021828.000|20110104021828.000|CC1|TABLE WAS FINALLY DETERMINED    
20110104021828.000|20110104021830.000|CC1|AFTER TRYING MANY DIFFERENT     
20110104021830.000|20110104021836.000|CC1|COMBINATIONS.                   
20110104021836.000|20110104021838.000|CC1|EACH CONVEYOR SYSTEM IS MADE TO 
20110104021838.000|20110104021839.000|CC1|ORDER, TO FIT THE RESTAURANT'S  
20110104021839.000|20110104021843.000|CC1|NEEDS.                          
20110104021843.000|20110104021844.000|CC1|SUSHI RESTAURANTS COME IN ALL   
20110104021844.000|20110104021851.000|CC1|SHAPES AND SIZES.               
20110104021851.000|20110104021853.000|CC1|THANKS TO THIS NEW TECHNOLOGY,  
20110104021853.000|20110104021856.000|CC1|THE FIRM CAN NOW OFFER A        
20110104021856.000|20110104021857.000|CC1|SEEMINGLY ENDLESS VARIETY OF    
20110104021857.000|20110104021900.000|CC1|CONVEYOR SHAPES.                
20110104021900.000|20110104021901.000|CC1|THIS HAS BECOME A HUGE ADVANTAGE
20110104021901.000|20110104021905.000|CC1|IN SECURING CLIENTS.            
20110104021905.000|20110104021906.000|CC1|>> Translator: WITH THE U-TURN  
20110104021906.000|20110104021907.000|CC1|CONVEYOR, WE CAN CREATE A       
20110104021907.000|20110104021910.000|CC1|PEA-SHAPED SYSTEM.

20110104021914.000|20110104021915.000|CC1|SYSTEM DEPENDING ON THE CLIENT'S
20110104021915.000|20110104021921.000|CC1|REQUESTS.                       
20110104021921.000|20110104021922.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE FIRM HAS HIGH  
20110104021922.000|20110104021926.000|CC1|HOPES FOR ITS NEXT GENERATION   
20110104021926.000|20110104021930.000|CC1|CONVEYOR.                       
20110104021930.000|20110104021935.000|CC1|THIS CONVEYOR BELT ISN'T MOVING.
20110104021935.000|20110104021936.000|CC1|BUT PUT A PLATE ON IT AND THERE 
20110104021936.000|20110104021945.000|CC1|SHE GOES.                       
20110104021945.000|20110104021947.000|CC1|THE SECRET IS A MAGNET ATTACHED 
20110104021947.000|20110104021952.000|CC1|TO THE UNDERSIDE OF EACH PLATE. 
20110104021952.000|20110104021954.000|CC1|THE CHAIN UNDER THE CONVEYOR

20110104022609.000|20110104022612.000|CC1|YEAR'S CONTEST AT THE SHRINE IS 
20110104022612.000|20110104022616.000|CC1|CALLED TOMASISITY.              
20110104022616.000|20110104022618.000|CC1|MEN IN LOIN CLOTHS RACED 250

20110104022624.000|20110104022625.000|CC1|WEIGHT IS BELIEVED TO BRING LUCK
20110104022625.000|20110104022633.000|CC1|TO THOSE WHO TOUCH IT.          
20110104022633.000|20110104022634.000|CC1|THE TRADITION SAYS IF A PERSON  
20110104022634.000|20110104022636.000|CC1|FROM THE SEASIDE BECOMES THE    
20110104022636.000|20110104022638.000|CC1|LAST TO HAND THE BALL OVER TO   
20110104022638.000|20110104022638.000|CC1|THE PRIEST, IT WILL BE A GOOD   
20110104022638.000|20110104022640.000|CC1|YEAR FOR FISHING.

20110104022644.000|20110104022703.000|CC1|BALL OFF.                       
20110104022703.000|20110104022705.000|CC1|IN OSAKA, WESTERN JAPAN,        
20110104022705.000|20110104022707.000|CC1|TRADITIONAL PUPPETS USED IN THE 
20110104022707.000|20110104022711.000|CC1|ART OF BUNRAKU WELCOMED         
20110104022711.000|20110104022713.000|CC1|FANS WITH SERVINGS OF JAPANESE
